JobFullDesc: Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, a theme of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us to achieve our mission.We are looking for a seasoned Integrated Marketing Communications specialist to join the Subsidiary Central Marketing Organization (CMO) in the Industry Integrated Marketing Manager role. The Central Marketing Organization (CMO) drives digital marketing transformation and execution in the Subsidiary. CMO delivers marketing capabilities and expertise to drive business growth and create Microsoft fans. CMO’s data-driven marketing insights innovate go-to-market (GTM) campaigns with clear customer targeting, leveraging global customer nurture programs, digital events, social marketing-all through world-class marketing operations. CMO is a strategic partner with Sales teams across all customer and partner segments and prioritized industries, as well as product-focused marketing teams and communications. CMO models Microsoft leadership values and nurtures a diverse and inclusive team. Being part of the Subsidiary CMO organization, the Industry Integrated Marketing Manager (IMM) role owns the Subsidiary Integrated Marketing Plan aligned to sales and marketing plays and driving new lead generation, nurture and consumption as prioritized by industry sales in alignment with Area and Subsidiary Industry Go-To-Market Plan.  The IMM leads local integrated marketing planning discussions bringing audience and competitive insights and marketing data to inform marketing plans and prioritize local execution and investments according to AHQ guidance and Subsidiary business objectives. You deliver local campaign execution excellence leading a complex vteam of local stakeholders: sales teams, Subsidiary Business Group Leads, Product Marketing Managers (PMMs), Partner Marketing Advisors (PMAs) and Communication/PR. You partner with Area Event & Digital team and Data Insight Lead to align local executions and ensure all activities are set up properly in our tools and systems to enable tracking, reporting and local optimization. A data-driven marketer, you leverage marketing insights dashboards daily to surface opportunities, drive marketing planning decisions with local stakeholders and lead connected sales and marketing discussions with sales teams.  The role requires an understanding of the sales organization’s priorities, Industry Prioritized Scenarios and Customer Usage Cases. As part of the CMO team, the Integrated Marketing Manager embraces the company’s Marketing principles, maximizes local marketing spend and driving marketing efficiency, marketing impact, and scale, and is a local Microsoft brand steward. You champion how we successfully engage the Industry Business Decision Maker (BDM) audience at scale through Industry relevant narratives and marketing programs designed to support prioritized verticals in your Subsidiary. As an Industry go-to-market expert, you ensure marketing execution is optimized to achieve local business goals and inspire our customers to significantly advance in their Digital Transformation journey.
